entry.title: Sam Altman Retakes Helm at OpenAI with Microsoft on the Board
entry.summary: “One of the most important things for the team that builds AGI safely is the ability to handle stressful and uncertain situations,” Altman said.

entry.title: FTX Cleared to Sell $873 Million in Grayscale Bitcoin Trust Shares and Other Holdings
entry.summary: Collapsed crypto exchange FTX can move ahead with selling some 32 million shares across multiple digital asset trusts to recover funds.

entry.title: Esports Giant Team Liquid Reveals Collab With NFT Game Illuvium
entry.summary: Team Liquid will be releasing themed NFTs for Illuvium, advise on game development, and help create the game's esports scene.

entry.title: Amazon Amps Up Its AI Arsenal With an Image Generator to Take On Adobe and Stable Diffusion
entry.summary: Coming on the heels of the “Q” large language model, Amazon Titan brings multimodal AI capabilities to the AWS platform.

entry.title: The ‘Make It More’ ChatGPT Trend—And How to Play Along at Home
entry.summary: Pushing AI image generation to the limit. Then pushing some more.

entry.title: Stability AI in Turmoil, CEO Under Pressure as Possible Sale Looms
entry.summary: Stability AI, known for Stable Diffusion, is exploring a sale as controversy swirls around Emad Mostaque.

entry.title: Bored People on the Internet Are Using AI to Animate Memes
entry.summary: Generative AI is bringing old memes to life, making them as funny (and creepy) as they can be.

entry.title: PlayStation Plus: Latest Free PS5 Games to Download
entry.summary: Lego 2K Drive leads the next wave of free PlayStation 5 games for Plus subscribers. Here’s when you can grab ‘em.

entry.title: Crypto Sponsorships Are Back? University of Miami Strikes Deal With Helium Mobile
entry.summary: Helium Mobile—a service built on a decentralized, crypto-powered network—is the newest sponsor of Miami Hurricanes sports teams.

entry.title: Another Bitcoin ETF Hopeful Enters the Race
entry.summary: Swiss firm Pando Asset has filed an application with the SEC to offer its Spot Bitcoin Trust to U.S. investors.

entry.title: You Can Soon Play Grand Theft Auto Games on Netflix—Here's How
entry.summary: Streaming giant Netflix previously said a Grand Theft Auto deal was just a rumor, but three mobile games will launch soon to subscribers.

entry.title: Charlie Munger Meme Coin Pumps 31,000% After Bitcoin Hater's Death
entry.summary: The volatile coin has made millions on the death of famed investor Charlie Munger, who skewered the crypto industry as “contrary to the interests of civilization.”

entry.title: Coinbase CEO: We Asked the SEC for Feedback, All We Got Was a Lawsuit
entry.summary: In an exclusive interview with Decrypt, Brian Armstrong criticized U.S. regulators for treating crypto as a "jump ball" in an ongoing battle over which agency should police the market.

entry.title: Solana Gets Some Shine: Ethereum Rival Rallies Again
entry.summary: Solana's gains beat other major coins and tokens with a 7% price surge on Wednesday morning.

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Could 'Mitigate' Climate Change: Cornell Study
entry.summary: The study found that wind and solar farms could generate millions of dollars in the precommercial phase before they're connected to the grid.

entry.title: 'District 9' Director's Shooter 'Off the Grid' Launches Mobile Game Amid Avalanche Subnet Rollout
entry.summary: In an exclusive interview, Gunzilla Games CEO Vlad Korolev shares the latest plans for Off the Grid and its many crypto integrations.

entry.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Marketplace Bioniq Launches—On Internet Computer
entry.summary: Backed by Polychain, Bioniq uses Internet Computer like a Bitcoin layer-2, tapping into its time and cost savings via wrapped assets.

entry.title: Pika Wows in Debut as AI Video Generator Takes Aim at Tech Giants
entry.summary: A $55 million raise allows the startup to compete against giants Meta, Adobe, and Stability AI.

entry.title: Portal Airdrop Is Coming—How to Farm the Gaming Token
entry.summary: Billed as a single platform to connect a wide array of blockchain games, Portal is planning an airdrop. Here’s how to earn tokens.

entry.title: Solana Is Soaring—You Can Earn More by Playing These Games
entry.summary: Want to stack SOL? These Solana games let you earn tokens while you play. Here are five games to get started with.

entry.title: ‘Rat Poison’: Cantankerous Bitcoin Critic Charlie Munger Dies at 99
entry.summary: "I'm not proud of my country for allowing this crypto shit," he said earlier this year. "It's worthless, it's no good."

entry.title: Bitcoin Will Hit $100K in 2024, Predicts Standard Chartered—Again
entry.summary: The British multinational bank has returned to its bullish stance on the biggest digital coin as more signals turn green.

entry.title: All Dogs Can Go to Heaven—Later: FDA Advances Longevity Drug for Big Dogs
entry.summary: Extending canine lifespans was just the beginning, Loyal founder Celine Halioua says.

entry.title: Shrapnel Game Studio Founders Say Majority Shareholder Is Staging a Coup
entry.summary: Six founders at Shrapnel studio Neon Machine have filed suit against the investor alleging "severe harm," but say the game is still on track.

entry.title: Amazon Launches Q: A ChatGPT AI Competitor for Businesses
entry.summary: After carving out a leadership position in cloud computing, the firm is determined to claim a significant share of the burgeoning AI market.

entry.title: Coinbase Stock Is Soaring—What Does That Mean for Crypto?
entry.summary: Coinbase stock just hit a yearly high, outperforming Bitcoin, Ethereum, and most other related investments. Is the crypto proxy a safer bet than digital assets?

entry.title: Starfield Isn't Actually Boring, Game Maker Weirdly Explains in User Review Comments
entry.summary: Bethesda has been responding to negative Steam reviews—mostly by telling players they should keep playing if they’re bored.

entry.title: Coinbase Might Be Forced to Share Your Bitcoin Trading Data With the CFTC
entry.summary: The company was recently served with a subpoena pertaining to crypto exchange Bybit. But Coinbase customers with no relationship to that exchange say they’re being targeted too.

entry.summary: The biggest digital asset by market cap hit is up by more than 134% this year.

entry.title: Are NFTs Ever Coming Back?
entry.summary: In this weeks episode we sit down with Cashtro from Arcade.xyz to discuss NFTs, shitcoins, what collections have held onto their floor prices, and more.

entry.summary: Lads on top: the prominent Solana NFT project leads the market in 24-hour sales volume as prices climb to yet another peak.

entry.summary: The Solana-based Pyth token is up 35% over the last seven days.

entry.title: Ethereum’s Vitalik Buterin: If AI Turns on Us 'Even Mars May Not Be Safe'
entry.summary: AI development needs to prioritize human intention for positive outcomes, not just profit maximization, says Buterin.

entry.title: How to AI: Best AI Tools for Students
entry.summary: Not all students are letting AI do their homework. Others are seizing upon the technology to genuinely augment their education.

entry.title: Cardano Founder Charles Hoskinson: Bitcoin Gets ‘Complete Pass’ From SEC
entry.summary: The Cardano founder argued that Bitcoin is not decentralized, and that other cryptocurrencies are unfairly considered securities.

entry.title: BitMEX Founder Arthur Hayes: U.S. Treatment of CZ, Binance ‘Absurd’
entry.summary: In a lengthy essay, Hayes argued that the $4.3 billion fine levied by U.S. authorities against Binance was “arbitrary.”

entry.title: 4 Things CZ Can Do in Seattle While Waiting to See If He's Going to Prison
entry.summary: Binance founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao got news today that he's stuck in America for the time being. So why not make the most of it?

entry.title: AI Can Fix Your DeFi Smart Contracts, Researchers Claim
entry.summary: Lightning Cat is an AI model trained to catch blockchain problems before they can be exploited by armies of bots and hackers.

entry.title: Gaming Tokens Keep Rising as Axie Infinity, Ronin, and Illuvium Pump
entry.summary: Video game tokens including AXS, RON, and ILV had a strong week, plus ApeCoin hit a three-month high over the weekend.

entry.title: Where in the World Is Hex Founder Richard Heart?
entry.summary: The SEC has been trying, and apparently failing, to hunt down controversial Hex founder Richard Heart for months.

entry.title: Pudgy Penguins Release Exclusive Walmart 'Influencer Box' for Cyber Monday
entry.summary: The prominent Ethereum NFT project continues pumping out plush toys, serving up a Cyber Monday exclusive via Walmart.

entry.title: Web Summit: Will Web3 Gaming Ever be Mainstream?
entry.summary: Animoca Brands CEO Robby Yung, EndeavorXR CEO Amy Peck and Gamee co-founder CEO Bozena Rezab joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves on stage at Web Summit to talk about the future of Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Allie Eve Knox on Spankchain and the life of a Crypto Financial Dominatrix
entry.summary:
Welcome to the first IRL episode of This Time Will Be Different!
In this week's episode, our host, Reza Jafery, is joined by Allie Eve Knox, the Spankchain Chief of Staff and FinDomme.
They discuss - How to sell feet pics - If crypto is really as permissionless as it seems - the intersections between crypto and sex work

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Jeff Davis
entry.summary:
Artist Jeff Davis joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about his artistic practice, the path that brought him to Art Blocks, and his quietly sophisticated DJ abilities.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Heatbit Founder Alex Busarov on the Bitcoin Miner That Heats Your Home
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Heatbit founder Alex Busarov at Web Summit for a walkthrough of the firm's flagship product, a Bitcoin miner that acts as a domestic space heater—aimed at the casual user.

entry.title: Nym CEO Harry Halpin on Privacy, Decentralized VPNs and Tornado Cash
entry.summary: The founder of privacy-preserving mixnet Nym sat down with Decrypt at Web Summit to talk about its new decentralized VPN, the Web3 privacy landscape and why "devs should be defended" in the wake of the Tornado Cash crackdown.

entry.title: Pat Felder - The worst is over [Macro Deep Dive Episode]
entry.summary:
Welcome to the first Markets Edition of This Time Will Be Different! In this episode we dive into the current macroeconomic conditions around crypto and look at the data behind the price action.
Reza sits down with Pat Felder, founder of Prismatic Capital to discuss the current macro environment, and to answer the question on everyone's mind-- is the bear market really over?

entry.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sebastien Borget: 'We're Already Integrating AI'
entry.summary: Decrypt sat down with The Sandbox co-founder Sebastien Borget at Web Summit to talk about AI, the open metaverse and the creative challenges of interoperability.

entry.title: Dacoco CEO Saro McKenna: How Alien Worlds is Creating an AI-Powered 'Lore DAO' with Kevin J Anderson
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Dacoco CEO Sarojini McKenna at Web Summit 2023 to talk about Alien Worlds' new Lore DAO and its AI-powered collaboration with sci-fi author Kevin J Anderson.

entry.title: Avalon's Jeffrey Butler on Designing a Metaverse MMO That Lets Players Co-Create
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson and details his studio's new MMO game with interoperable assets—and how it will enable players to create and monetize their own content.

entry.title: How Gen Z Is Different: OTK Chief Strategy Officer Talks Creator Economy Shift and Rise of Kick
entry.summary: One True King, an esports and gaming lifestyle brand and media company, was founded by creators like Asmongold and Mizkif. OTK's Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz, who previously worked at TikTok and Twitch, shares with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the creator economy is changing.

entry.title: Moisés Zamora on Videomart and Bucking the Hollywood System
entry.summary: "Selena: The Series" creator and co-showrunner Moisés Zamora joins Decrypt's Sander Lutz at the Film3 Summit 2023 to discuss why the Hollywood system is broken and why he founded the Videomart NFT digital film marketplace to give creators more power.

entry.title: Why OTK Is Making Video Games
entry.summary: One True King (OTK) Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about OTK's long-term strategy and vision to become a content creator-powered media and video games company.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: LoVid
entry.summary:
Artistic duo LoVid, aka Tali Hinkis and Kyle Lapidus, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about art, lettuce, and the hellscape (in someone’s opinion) that is Miami.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Barney on DeFi, Privacy, and Vega
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Barney the founder of Vega Protocol.
They discuss the current state of DeFi, what's wrong with the apps being built today, whether or not privacy matters when its only applied to an L2, and most importantly-- which form of sales tax is the sexiest.

entry.title: Why Is Phantom Galaxies Releasing Two Versions of Its Game?
entry.summary: Animoca Brands-owned Blowfish Studios is building a space mech pilot game called Phantom Galaxies. Blowfish Cofounder Ben Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his plans for the game's release.

entry.title: Sophie Maxx on NFTs, Augmented Reality, and Fashion
entry.summary: This week our host is joined by Sophie Maxx (Web3Maxx) to discuss NFTs, augmented reality, the metaverse, how blockchain is sneaking into the fashion world, and more!

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Kevin Rose
entry.summary:
Kevin Rose, co-founder and CEO of PROOF and co-creator of the hit Moonbirds NFT collection, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer some hard-hitting questions about his childhood dreams, his wife’s candy preferences, and his undying love of rap music.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: What Happened to Atari's Token? Inside Atari's Blockchain Plans
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Atari X director Tyler Drewitz about what happened with Atari's token plans, whether a token is coming, and what Atari games might be getting the blockchain treatment. Oh, and there's lots of Easter eggs.

entry.title: Twitch CEO Dan Clancy Is a 'Wild Card,' Says Marketing Director
entry.summary: Twitch Senior Director of Community Marketing Mary Kish speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Twitch CEO Dan Clancy, Ninja, Twitch's new simulcasting rules, the biggest differences between Twitch and rival platform Kick, and the role of esports on the streaming platform.
